        errorMessage - the error message in the exception when CVS Injection check fails

      • convertStringToInteger

        public static Integer convertStringToInteger(String stringValue,
                                             Integer defaultValue)
        Convert a String to an Integer, returning a default value if the string is blank.

        Parameters:
        stringValue - the string to convert, may be null
        defaultValue - the default value
        Returns:
        the Integer represented by the string, or the default if the string is blank
